description: This plugin allows you to authenticate a Google Service Account in a simple, two-step workflow. You can use an API-returned Bearer Token to authenticate your service account requests.
name: Google Service Account
plugin_instructions:
Full instructions are available here: https://elegislate.gitbook.io/bubble-plugins/

Quickstart Guide: 
1.) Generate a signed JWT via the "Create Assertion" action in a workflow using your credentials.
2.) Use the assertion in a "Request Bearer Token" API Action in a workflow.

Need an example? 
https://bubble.io/page?name=index&id=google-service-account-example&tab=tabs-1

Uses:
*This allows you to make authorized API calls to any of Google's API's. Just place a header in your API call that is called "Authorization" with the value "Bearer returnedBearerTokenHere".
